name: The Next Street
description: The Next Street has made a splash in the Driver Training Business by putting a special focus on fanatic customer service. Now they are making their service training programs available to Uber Partners. Learn all of the tips and tricks that helped us rise to the top of our industry and use them to become the highest rated and paid drivers on the Uber Platform. These programs are fast, easy to understand and easy to apply to any Uber driver's day to day life. We are looking forward to helping you make your Uber experience outstanding.
